title: Inside the women-only executive retreat that turns boxing into leadership training
full_text: Inside the women-only executive retreat that turns boxing into leadership training. At Fight Co.Lab, leaders trade off between boxing drills and personal development sessions. It's designed to be an intense experience.. Erin Renzas is a former marketing executive.Dina Litovsky for BI Erin Renzas spent nearly two decades dutifully climbing the career ladder before she hit a breaking point.She had achieved many of th… [+7360 chars]
